item.title: Cinn Rolls By The Ocean
item.dc:creator: Michelle Luong
item.description: Throwback to my weekend camping trip at Porteau Cove this year! My campsite had absolutely gorgeous views right next to the ocean. And of course, I brought along some cinnamon rolls to enjoy as I watched the sunset.

item.title: Our website is live!
item.dc:creator: Michelle Luong
item.description: Introducing a new website for Mishie’s Munchies. This will be a new space where we will showcase our products, menus, order dates, blogs, and much more!

item.title: New KitchenAid
item.dc:creator: Michelle Luong
item.description: This week, I purchased a new 6 quart KitchenAid stand mixer from Costco! It was on sale for $320 from $400 and I couldn’t resist the temptation to upgrade my equipment and have a stand mixer that could make more rolls at a time!
